name: Bighead Brian
description:
A game about a big-brained guy looking to get some significant brain damage. Will he beat his brain into submission? Or will he be forced to stay in the library and... LEARN!

Controls:

R: Reset the level when stuck.

WASD / QSZD: Movement.

J: Headbash.

K: Climb.

L: Roll.

Escape: Pause.
